forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 63, with temperatures falling to around 61 in the afternoon. Southwest wind 10 to 25 mph, with gusts as high as 31 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 56. West southwest wind 20 to 24 mph, with gusts as high as 31 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, the morning unfolds with a promise of warmth tempered by a gentle breeze, as the day greets the city dressed in mostly sunny hues. A high around sixty-three degrees beckons, though a slight chill in the air will settle in this afternoon, reminding us of summer's hesitance. With southwest winds whispering at ten to twenty-five miles per hour and occasional gusts adding a playful dance to the foliage, the moment carries an invigorating bite. As the sun climbs higher, one might capture the skyline’s contours breaking through the remnants of a marine layer—though today appears to be relatively clear compared to the damp embrace of fog that often shrouds the Bay.

As daylight wanes, expect a gradual softening to partly cloudy skies, settling into a mellow evening with temperatures dipping to a mild fifty-six. The wind continues its brisk cadence from the west-southwest, coaxing the last warm rays of sunlight as they bow out for the day. To embrace the vibrant atmosphere, dress in layers—perhaps a light sweater or jacket will suffice as evening approaches. With the weather playing a harmonious tune, the day invites leisurely strolls along the Embarcadero or a quiet sit at one of the many inviting cafes. Wander through the Civic Center, or take a moment to enjoy a book under the shade of an old oak; all activities that suit the charm of this city on a beautiful July day.
